name: electric switch
description:
𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗼 𝗺𝘆 𝗴𝗮𝗺𝗲

the game is about a town which electricity is gone due to  some technical difficulties

and you have to turn on the ''SWITCH'' to provide electricity to the town citizen but there are three ''SWITCH'' to turn the electricity on and also  don't touch the battery type wire you also have a helicopter to get to that place

𝗱𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗴𝗮𝗺𝗲

this game was made with construct 3 oh oh you don't know what construct3 is its just a game engine that i am learning use it gamers ''BEEP SOUND EFFECT'' so yea also used piskel for pixcal art ,BoscaCeoil for music and sound effect ,also used these lospec color palette
